00007 CVideoDecoder::CVideoDecoder() : video_index(-1), sws_flags(SWS_BICUBIC), img_convert_ctx(NULL), fileOpened(false)
00008 {
00009     sws_opts = sws_getContext(16,16,0, 16,16,0, sws_flags, NULL,NULL,NULL);
00010 }

00012 CVideoDecoder::~CVideoDecoder()
00013 {
00014     CloseFile();
00015     avcodec_close(pCodecCtx);
00016 }

00018 bool CVideoDecoder::OpenFile(string fname)
00019 {
00020     CloseFile();
00021 
00022     fileName = fname;
00023 
00024     // otevreni videa
00025     video_index = -1;
00026     if(av_open_input_file(&pFmtCtx, fname.c_str(), NULL, 0, NULL) != 0)
00027     {
00028         cerr << "Chyba otevirani souboru" << endl;
00029         return false;
00030     }
00031 
00032     // nalezeni streamu
00033     if(av_find_stream_info(pFmtCtx) < 0)
00034     {
00035         cerr << "Chyba zjistovani stream_info " << endl;
00036         return false;
00037     }
00038 
00039     // nalezeni video streamu
00040     for(unsigned int i=0;i<pFmtCtx->nb_streams;i++)
00041     {
00042         if(pFmtCtx->streams[i]->codec->codec_type == CODEC_TYPE_VIDEO)
00043         {
00044             video_index = i;
00045             break;
00046         }
00047     }
00048 
00049     if(video_index == -1)
00050     {
00051         cerr << "Nenalezen video stream" << endl;
00052         return false;
00053     }
00054 
00055     // nalezeni codecu
00056     video_stream = pFmtCtx->streams[video_index];
00057     pCodecCtx = video_stream->codec;
00058 
00059     pCodec = avcodec_find_decoder(pCodecCtx->codec_id);
00060     if (!pCodec)
00061     {
00062         cerr << "Chyba nalezeni codecu" << endl;
00063         return false;
00064     }
00065 
00066     if(avcodec_open(pCodecCtx, pCodec) < 0)
00067     {
00068         cerr << "Chyba otevreni codecu" << endl;
00069         return false;
00070     }
00071 
00072     pFrame = avcodec_alloc_frame();
00073 
00074     sws_flags = av_get_int(sws_opts, "sws_flags", NULL);
00075     img_convert_ctx = sws_getCachedContext(img_convert_ctx,
00076         pCodecCtx->width, pCodecCtx->height, pCodecCtx->pix_fmt,
00077         pCodecCtx->width, pCodecCtx->height, PIX_FMT_RGB32, sws_flags, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00078 
00079     if (img_convert_ctx == NULL)
00080     {
00081         cerr << "Cannot initialize the conversion context" << endl;
00082         return false;
00083     }
00084 
00085     fileOpened = true;
00086     return true;
00087 }
00088 
00089 void CVideoDecoder::CloseFile()
00090 {
00091     if(fileOpened)
00092     {
00093         av_free(pFrame);
00094         av_close_input_file(pFmtCtx);
00095         sws_freeContext(img_convert_ctx);
00096     }
00097     fileOpened = false;
00098 }
00099 
00100 bool CVideoDecoder::GetNextFrame(BITMAP *bmp)
00101 {
00102     if(!fileOpened) return false;
00103     if(bmp == NULL) return false;
00104 
00105     int got_picture;
00106     while(av_read_frame(pFmtCtx, &pkt) >= 0)
00107     {
00108         if(pkt.stream_index == video_index)
00109         {
00110             avcodec_decode_video(pCodecCtx, pFrame, &got_picture, pkt.data, pkt.size);
00111             if(got_picture)
00112             {
00113                 AVPicture pict;
00114                 pict.data[0] = (uint8_t*)bmp->line[0];
00115                 pict.linesize[0] = pCodecCtx->width*4;
00116                 sws_scale(img_convert_ctx, pFrame->data, pFrame->linesize,
00117                     0, pCodecCtx->height, pict.data, pict.linesize);
00118                 av_free_packet(&pkt);
00119                 return true;
00120             }
00121         }
00122         av_free_packet(&pkt);
00123     }
00124 
00125     return false;
00126 }
00127 
00128 void CVideoDecoder::DumpFormat()
00129 {
00130     if(fileOpened) dump_format(pFmtCtx, 0, fileName.c_str(), 0);
00131     else cout << "No opened file" << endl;
00132 }
